title: Best of The Program | Guests: Dr. Voddie Baucham & Dr. Scott Atlas | 7/13/20
description:
Glenn and Pat discuss conspiracy theories that Wayfair is trafficking people through cabinet sales. A rapper claims that the Black Lives Matter movement is being pushed by George Soros and not the black community. Dr. Voddie Baucham explains the concept of “woke Shahada” and how the religious aspects of the Black Lives Matter moment have been embraced even by Christians. Hoover Institution senior fellow Dr. Scott Atlas breaks down the reality of COVID-19 and why the science supports reopening schools.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
